txt.en: Orcs have been troubling the road between the Gladden Fields and Duskenvale, preventing trade and travel. The trader Lúfred has asked you to take care of the issue.
Lúfred has asked you to stop the Orc activity in Duskenvale so trade can resume.\n\nYou should find the Orc camp in the hills in Duskenvale.
This appears to be the source of the Orc ambushers
You have defeated the Orcs in the hills of Duskenvale.\n\nYou should return to Lúfred at the Beorning Watchpost to inform him.
You have discovered a camp of Orcs in northern Duskenvale.\n\nYou should defeat the Orcs and their leader in Brafulug.

You inform Lúfred that the Orcs have been defeated.

'Wonderful! I cannot thank you enough, [placeholder]. A trader is nothing if he cannot freely trade!

'Now I have to convince these stubborn Beornings that the road can be opened again!'

'The Beornings tell me that I can't deliver these goods because of Orc activity, but they also will not do anything about it! Why? Because then the post would be undermanned! You look to be skilled in combat, [placeholder]. Would you please do something about these Orcs? I will pay you, of course!'
Find the Orc camp of Brafulug
